subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: McAdoo, 38, who said Friday that he would retain Steve Spagnuolo as defensive coordinator, was offered the coaching job at about the same time he appeared to be moving up the Eagles’ wish list.
snippet: McAdoo, 38, who said Friday that he would retain Steve Spagnuolo as defensive coordinator, was offered the coaching job at about the same time he appeared to be moving up the Eagles’ wish list.
